name: spelunky2ls-cli
description:
It's lightning fast and you can use it over ssh. Once again I just made the cli, injector by iojonmbnmb. 
 (Pg)Up/Down: Select | ^Arrows: x,y | Enter: Spawn | ^W: Erase Word | ^C: Quit
    425: ITEM_CLONEGUNSHOT
    565: ITEM_WEBGUN
  > 566: ITEM_SHOTGUN
    578: ITEM_CLONEGUN
 566 0,0 > item gun_
## Usage Install https://rustup.rs/ and https://nodejs.org/ (you'll want to check the build tools during installation too). Extract the rust project somewhere and run in `cmd`: ``` cd c:\where\ever\you\extracted\rust-injector\ cargo build node cli ``` You can now start the game before or after running the cli or even restart the game and it should get injected all the same...
author: Dregu
